name: Root Route
description:
A casual mobile game inspired by "Ice Slide Puzzles" from older Pokemon games. Your goal is to navigate a tree root to the bottom of the level by using simple swipe controls.

How to play:

Swipe the screen to move the root towards the water to finish the puzzles.

Credits:

Roope Lappalainen - Code/Implementation

Jyri Saukkonen - Code/Implementation
